snippet: With soda sales sliding in grocery and convenience stores and other retail outlets, new equipment offers the companies a means of introducing consumers to their products.
abstract: PepsiCo will unveil range of new self-serve equipment for dispensing drinks, in places like restaurants, dining halls and movie theaters, at the National Restaurant Association Show; equipment, called Spire, is answer to Coca-Cola's Freestyle, new kind of drink dispenser that jolted sleepy fountain business back into life four years ago.
lead_paragraph: With soda sales sliding in grocery and convenience stores and other retail outlets, new equipment offers the companies a means of introducing consumers to their products.

headline.main: Pepsi Challenges Coke in the Race to Design a More Tappable Soda Fountain
headline.print_headline: Pepsi Challenges Coke in the Race to Design a More Tappable Soda Fountain
